page.title: 10Playground Games
page.content: At break I usualy play Blockie with my friends.In that you close your eyes and count up to a certain number in a certain table.When you have done that you go to look for your friends.If you see them you run to the Blockie post (that is where you count)and say Block 1 2 3 _____ who ever you found.If they get to the post before you they say Block 1 2 3 myself. Another game we play is Stuck_in_the_Mud.In that you have one person who is it.You have two dens also.The object of the game is to get from one den to another with out getting caught.If you do get caught you stand still and stick your arms out for somebody to free you.You only have 3 lives. We also play.Om_Bom_Bay,Ice Cream and Soda,Lon-don and Witch Tiggie. Clare Sowerby
